channel.title: Compile Error
channel.description:
I can't compile on any server sources :S... Plz help I have the latest Java...
Anyone who can figure this out get REP :) :)
[size=20pt]Errors[/size]
[u]Pimpscape[/u] 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
[u]PrIvAtE ScApE[/u] 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
[u]SinScape[/u] 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
[u]ShotScape[/u] The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
[u]Barrowsscape[/u] 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
[u]EliteScape_V.4.5[/u] The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
[u]zscapepl0x[/u] Compiling *.java 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
[u]SoulScape[/u] C:Documents and Settings**CENSOR**DesktopSoulScape -- New Public>javac *.java 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:Documents and Settings**CENSOR**DesktopSoulScape -- New Public>pause Press any key to continue . . .
[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 02:48:54 PM[/size][hr]Plz help I been stuck on this for awhile...

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @pbrain30 pbrain30
item.description:
@pbrain30 wrote:

right listen this is wat i got
@echo off
COLOR 08
title Knightmare Client
“F:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09injava” server
pause

but it wont let me change things right i use compiler and nothing happens my compiler fucked up and im 40% complete this just had to happen to MY game[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 01:22:10 AM[/size][hr][quote=“pbrain30”]right listen this is wat i got
@echo off
COLOR 08
title Knightmare Client
“F:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09injava” server

come on please help
pause

but it wont let me change things right i use compiler and nothing happens my compiler fucked up and im 40% complete this just had to happen to MY game[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @123unknown321 123unknown321
item.description:
@123unknown321 wrote:

[quote=“Patchumz, post:17, topic:21028”]Lol, in the compiler, put this

Shotscape Compiler Edit

@echo off title shotscape server javac *.java pause

Simple as that, lol.[/quote]

He said that doesn’t work

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

Lol, in the compiler, put this

Shotscape Compiler Edit

@echo off title shotscape server javac *.java pause

Simple as that, lol.

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

@echo off title Aces316rocks' Awesome Poonage Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error

item.description:

Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

use this in your compiler:

@echo off title Shotscape Compiler "C:\program files\java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
